resources.string: My name is Nia. I go to CUNY Queens College for a degree in Computer Science. I am from New York. This app was created to serve as a reflection of my website to show what I can do with Android Applications. This app has the same functionality as:
It is the platform where I take on coding projects so I can do what I love, and support myself! I code Android Apps (iOS is on my horizon though!) and design websites. I also blog:
You can learn more about my past work:
To understand more about how projects are priced tap

The form below is the quickest way to reach me regarding projects. You may also email me directly at: \n \t niaapplications@gmail.com
\nBlog comments are also responded to frequently. I look forward to hearing from you regarding exciting new projects, questions about current collaborations, and feedback that helps me better serve my clients\' vision.

Projects in the past have ranged from $200-$2,000 USD.
Application projects start at $300, Website design projects start at $200.
Alternatively you can opt for the hourly option, my hourly rate is $28 USD.
Consultation is free. If you have a potential project, contact me here. If you wish to view my previous work click here.
I look forward to working with you!
Pricing is determined on a project by project basis.
